name: leftovers
effect: Held: Heals the holder by 1/16 its max HP at the end of each turn.
short_effect: Held: Restores 1/16 (6.25%) holder’s max HP at the end of each turn.

flavor_text.sun_moon: An item to be held by a Pokémon. The holder’s HP is slowly but steadily restored throughout every battle.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: An item to be held by a Pokémon. The holder’s HP is slowly but steadily restored throughout every battle.
flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: An item to be held by a Pokémon. The holder’s HP is slowly but steadily restored throughout every battle.
